roleset.name: fire a gun
roleset.note: FIRE-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus. Member of VNcls throw-17.1-1. (from fire.01-v)
FIRE-N NOTES: Updated by Julia. Member of Vncls throw-17.1-1. (from fire.01-n)

example.name: fire-v: metaphorical
example.text: With three minutes left on the clock, Mr. Aikman takes the snap, steps back and fires a 21-yard pass -- straight into the hands of an Atlanta defensive back.
example.arg: With three minutes left on the clock
straight into the hands of an Atlanta defensive back

example.name: fire-v: literal with GOL
example.text: The helicopters reportedly fired missiles at offices of Palestinian leader Yasser Arafat 's ` Fatah movement ' .
example.arg: at offices of Palestinian leader Yasser Arafat's 'Fatah movement'

example.name: fire-n: with arg0
example.text: He is under intense fire from other Palestinian groups

roleset.name: cause to cease employment
roleset.note: FIRE-V NOTES: Member of VNcls fire-10.10. (from fire.02-v)
FIRING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from firing.02-n)

example.name: fire-v: most commonly passive
example.text: But people familiar with the agenda of the board's meeting last week in London said [Mr. McGovern]-1 was fired *trace*-1.

example.name: fire-v: passive with agent
example.text: The last time Columbia Pictures was looking for a studio chief, they note, Warner released producer David Puttnam from his contract, then took him back after he-1 was subsequently fired *trace*-1 by his bosses at Columbia.

example.name: fire-v: with former job
example.text: John-1 was fired *trace*-1 from his job as chief burger-flipper.
example.arg: from his job as chief burger-flipper

example.name: fire-v: pottery
example.text: John fired his play-doh sculpture in the microwave.

roleset.name: fuel or ignite
roleset.note: FIRE-V NOTES: Frame edited by Arrick. No VNcls. (from fire.04-v)

example.name: fire-v: non-agentive manner
example.text: Instead, they were model steam engines fired * by alcohol lamps which *T* were hand built, wheel by wheel, panel by panel, by Lin himself, some based * on his own designs, others scale models.

roleset.name: natural disaster: fire in a forest or other habitat
roleset.note: FIRE-N NOTES: Added by Julia in a Natural Disaster roleset endeavor. Comparion to wildfire, brushfire, bushfire. (from fire.02-n)

roles.note: The "VSP" function tags on 'death/injury toll' and 'damages/cost' correspond to the RED cause relation.

example.name: forest_fire-n: args 1, 2
example.text: There is a 200-acre forest fire burning in Wirt County not yet under control.

roleset.name: impassioned, fervent
roleset.note: FIERY-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. (from fiery.01-j)

example.name: fiery-j: All args
example.text: She wears a funky, self-aware outfit, she's fiery about political causes and she constantly argues with her parents even though she still mooches off them.
